title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility      The Visitor Centers at Spalding and Big Hole battlefield have accessible restroom facilities and exhibits. A free wheel chair is available at the Spalding visitor center. The film shown at the Spalding Visitor Center has open captions and audio description. Trails at Canoe Camp outside of Orofino, Idaho and the Heart of Monster in Kamiah, Idaho have accessible trails.
